attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-1115

Date: 2014-10-21

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Marie Lemay, President, Economic Development Agency of Canada for the Regions of Quebec, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($221,900 - $261,000), effective April 1, 2014.
